title: So I got some RP for Christmas, what should I do with it?
body: I got twenty bucks of RP for Christmas and I grabbed a few of my holiday deal skins and am left with about 2200 RP. I was debating if I should grab the Jinx skin since I won't have another chance until next year but that project vayne skin is incredible. I don't get RP often so I was thinking maybe I should just save it and wait for a sale I like. Should I blow my load now or be a thrifty panda and stash away my gold?
